call_title: Dev Update Oct. 13th 2024 |  Satergo, Paideia, Celaut, Sigs Mining, Nautilus and more!

decisions.decision: When it's hard to find a guest, will do spotlight on projects in the Ergo ecosystem as fallback
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Sometimes hard to get dev update calls off the ground with guests
decisions.quote: this week I figured we would have a fallback on times when it's hard to find a guest. We would do kind of a spotlight on projects in the Ergo ecosystem

decisions.decision: Vote to be created for mint price suggested three ERG
decisions.speaker: NoRoYogi
decisions.context: Sigmanauts mining pool miner ID implementation
decisions.quote: Vote to be created for mint price suggested three ERG

decisions.decision: Started voting on contract update to address storage rent issue, possibly burn update keys as well
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: SigmaUSD update contract box NFT can be storage rented in about seven months
decisions.quote: started voting on contract update to address the issue possibly burn update keys as well

commitments.commitment: Will do some polishing and release an alpha on the Abyss channel over the weekend
commitments.quote: We'll do some polishing and release an alpha on the Abyss channel over the weekend

commitments.commitment: Alpha 2 will be released later today
commitments.quote: alpha 2 will be released later today, I guess

commitments.commitment: Hope to start coding this weekend
commitments.quote: I hope to start coding this weekend

commitments.commitment: Will maybe release a standalone library if people are interested
commitments.quote: I will maybe release a standalone library if people are interested

commitments.commitment: Maybe try to get HQx next week to talk about MewFinance
commitments.quote: maybe I'll try to get HQx next week to talk about MewFinance and the Mew Shop

open_questions.question: Waiting for code for USE to get back from vacation for mainnet deployment
open_questions.context: Dexy payout contract and mainnet deployment readiness

open_questions.question: Discussing fixing one issue with Dusek, will provide details after fix
Vote to be created for bonus distribution frequency

reversals_or_updates.update: Close old PR and start a new one for 6.0 alpha 2
reversals_or_updates.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: MewFinance presale first round sold out, second round sold out within 30 minutes
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sold out of all five hats, did three shirts and three sweatshirts with only two of each left
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Contract work for the Paideia SDK 232 issue was finished, test case is finished and passing
key_facts.speaker: Luivatra

key_facts.fact: Satergo version 1.80 was released on October 6th
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Beta testing for miner IDs is live for the main pool at ergo-miners.com
key_facts.speaker: NoRoYogi

key_facts.fact: Explorer is on block 1.2 million, needs to get to block 1.37 million
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Explorer sync has taken about 48 hours and will be located in Singapore
key_facts.speaker: qx()
